name: UPCADE_Space Invaders
description:
This is my spin on the classic game SPACE INVADER.

Check out my portfolio! https://danielmercer.wixsite.com/mysite

I made this as a part of a series of games I want to make called UPCADE, where I try to upgrade classic arcade games.

For Space Invaders, I decided to change around the Bunkers & UFO mechanics.

I DO NOT OWN ANY RIGHTS TO SPACE INVADERS, THIS WAS JUST A PROJECT I MADE FOR FUN

WARNING: Sound may be loud
